item.title: MetaMask will natively integrate the TRON network
item.description: August 19th - As per The Block, a strategic partnership agreement has been reached between TRON DAO and MetaMask. MetaMask will incorporate TRON natively within its self-hosted encrypted wallet that is developed by Consensys. This integration will enable MetaMask users to interact directly with the TRON ecosystem via the wallet interface.

item.title: Circle has announced that Circle Gateway has officially launched on the mainnet
item.description: August 19th. According to official channels, Circle has declared that a novel infrastructure, Circle Gateway, which is intended to achieve a unified cross-chain balance for USDC, has officially gone live on the mainnet. This enables users to access USDC across chains in seconds and will keep expanding to more blockchains. The key features are as follows:1. Cross-chain Access within <500ms: Instantly gain access to a unified USDC balance without the requirement of a cross-chain bridge or pre-positioned assets;2. Efficient Liquidity Management: Meet multi-chain liquidity demands through a single integration, minimizing capital utilization;3. Non-custodial Design: Users have full ownership and control of USDC, and funds can only be moved with signed authorization. Withdrawals do not require trust in a third party.

item.title: VCI Global Announces $2 Billion Partnership Through Sovereign-Grade Encryption Infrastructure
item.description: On August 19th, as per globenewswire, VCI Global Limited (with a Nasdaq code of VCIG) declared today that it has formed a partnership with a digital asset holder. Together, they have established a sovereign-level infrastructure joint venture (JV). This JV is backed by 18,000 bitcoins, which are valued at more than $21.6 billion at the current market price.Under the terms of the JV agreement, VCI Global will own 70% of the equity and take the lead in commercialization and infrastructure management. Meanwhile, its digital asset partner will maintain full custody and control over the Bitcoin reserves.

item.title: Trump's Son to Speak at Bitcoin Asia on August 29th
item.description: On August 19th, according to official information, Eric Trump, the son of former US President Donald Trump, is scheduled to give a speech at Bitcoin Asia on August 29th.It is reported that the Bitcoin Asia conference organized by the Bitcoin Conference will take place at the Hong Kong Convention and Exhibition Centre from August 28th to 29th.

item.title: Bullish has received $1.15 billion in proceeds from its IPO in the form of a stablecoin.
item.description: On August 19th, as per an official declaration, the crypto exchange Bullish has made an announcement. It has arranged to obtain the proceeds from its recently completed initial public offering (IPO) in the form of stablecoins amounting to $1.15 billion. This marks a historic milestone in the utilization of stablecoins in a U.S. IPO.The vast majority of the stablecoins were created on the Solana network for Bullish. Bullish has received the following stablecoins with denominations in USD and EUR: funds from the IPO, mainly settled in USDC, with some settled in EURC. All these stablecoins are held in exclusive custody by Coinbase, along with USDCV, EURCV, USDG, PYUSD, RLUSD, USD1, AUSD, and EURAU.

item.title: Top Trader The White Whale's long position is currently showing a paper profit of nearly $20 million.
item.description: On August 19th, as per on-chain analyst Ai Auntie (@ai_9684xtpa), the six addresses of top trader The White Whale still hold a combined value of $300 million. This includes 530,925.04 SOL long positions and 55,358.87 ETH long positions, with a total unrealized gain of $19.895 million.

item.title: Trump's Latest Interview Recap: Solely Interested in Ending Russia-Ukraine Conflict, Putin and Zelensky Must Make a Decision
item.description: August 19th. At 8:00 PM this evening, President Trump of the United States was interviewed on the FOX&FRIENDS program. The interview has come to an end, and the recap is as follows:路 Europeans have the hope to bring an end to the war between Ukraine and Russia. (Regarding the meeting between Putin and Zelensky) We will first allow them to meet. U.S.-Russia relations only make sense when we can make progress. I hope that President Putin of Russia behaves well; otherwise, the situation will be very serious.路 Zelensky must also show flexibility. Putin and Zelensky got along better than was expected. Arrangements are being made for Putin and Zelensky to meet. Putin and Zelensky must make decisions.路 Ukraine will not become a NATO member. France, Germany, and the UK hope to deploy ground troops in Ukraine. Putin may not want to reach an agreement. We will understand Putin's intentions in the coming weeks.路 (When asked about the United States not sending ground troops during the Russ

item.title: SharpLink has invested over $667 million to increase its holdings of 143,593 ETH.
item.description: On August 19th, according to official information, SharpLink announced the acquisition of 143,593 Ethereum (ETH) at a price of around $4,648 per coin. As a result, its total Ethereum holdings reached 740,760 coins.

item.title: Binance VIP Introduces Institution Switching Package for Whale Traders
item.description: On August 19th, as per an official announcement, Binance VIP has declared the launch of the "Institutional Switch Package," which is specifically tailored for high-frequency traders who are migrating from other cryptocurrency exchanges to Binance. The application for the "Institutional Switch Package" is now available, with a deadline set for December 31, 2025. Through this plan, high-frequency traders will be entitled to the following benefits:1. VIP 5 Identity Experience for 30 Days: Be eligible to enjoy a maximum 75% trading fee discount in spot, futures, and margin trading during the initial 30 days.2. Deposit Reward: Deposit a minimum of $1 million in eligible assets within the first 30 days and receive a 0.5% BNB trading fee rebate voucher reward (with a maximum of $5,000). This rebate voucher can be utilized to offset trading fees across all Binance products.3. Zero-Interest Institutional Loan Trial: Have the opportunity to enjoy a Binance institutional loan with a maximum

item.title: Real Estate Investment Company Cardone Capital Announces Acquisition of 130 BTC
item.description: On August 19th, according to official channels, the CEO of the real estate investment firm Cardone Capital, Grant Cardone, declared that he has once more augmented his holdings by 130 BTC (approximately $15 million).
